game.name: Drunken Cowboys
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Perforate, blow up, and take down friends and foes in tight, dusty Wild West arenas - all after you’ve all had a solid drink at the saloon. Drink, reload, shoot, drink again, and repeat. A stylish hat is guaranteed, so you can leave yours at home.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Perforate, blow up, and take down friends and foes in tight, dusty Wild West arenas - all after you’ve all had a solid drink at the saloon. Drink, reload, shoot, drink again, and repeat. A stylish hat is guaranteed, so you can leave yours at home.
